snippet: In a rambling statement on Thursday lasting almost an hour, Gen. Efraín Ríos Montt said he had never authorized or proposed attacks on any ethnic groups.
abstract: Gen Efrain Rios Montt, former dictator who ruled Guatemala during one of bloodiest periods of its long civil war, faces court trying him for genocide and denies any role in horrors narrated by Mayan survivors of massacres committed in 1980s.
lead_paragraph: In a rambling statement on Thursday lasting almost an hour, Gen. Efraín Ríos Montt said he had never authorized or proposed attacks on any ethnic groups.

headline.seo: Efraín Ríos Montt Denies Role in Guatemalan Massacres
headline.main: Ex-Dictator Denies Role in Guatemalan Massacres
headline.print_headline: Ex-Dictator Denies Role In Guatemalan Massacres

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject
